contentrichtext.text: {{notability|date=March 2013}} {{more footnotes|date=February 2011}} {{Italic title}} '''Guys Gone Wild''' is video series and male analogue of ''[[Girls Gone Wild (franchise)|Girls Gone Wild]]''. These video tapes and DVDs feature much the same content as the ''Girls'' equivalent, only instead showing young men performing for the camera â€” e.g., in the shower, playing football naked, etc.<ref>{{cite web|last=Swaim|first=Michael|title=Guys Gone Wild: A Comparative Study for the Well Versed Pornographist|url=http://www.collegehumor.com/article/1410034/guys-gone-wild-a-comparative-study-for-the-well-versed-pornographist|publisher=College Humor|accessdate=3 October 2012}}</ref> ==Criticism== In an article on the video series in ''The Taipei Times'',<ref>[http://www.taipeitimes.com/News/feat/archives/2004/07/03/2003177572 Article in The Taipei Times]</ref> Bill Horn of Mantra Entertainment notes there are [[sexist]] [[double standard]]s in these videos. For example, in the ''Girls Gone Wild'' series, sometimes the young women kiss, while the first round of tapes for the guys series, despite being aware of the large gay market, does not have that feature.<ref>{{cite web|title="Guys Go Wild" in New Video Series|url=http://www.foxnews.com/story/0,2933,124478,00.html|publisher=Fox News|accessdate=3 October 2012}}</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} <!--Maybe we should talk about celebrity cameos and use this source = http://www.nydailynews.com/gossip/2007/08/06/2007-08-06_internets_gone_wild_over_fdny_coverboy.html--> <!--ref list had the same article three times, from three different sources--> ==External links== * {{Official website|http://www.guysgonewild.com}} {{use mdy dates|date=June 2012}} [[Category:Media franchises]] [[Category:2000s pornographic films]] [[Category:2010s pornographic films]] [[Category:Gay pornographic films]] {{porn-film-stub}}
